title: Starting my PhD!
summary: I am excited to announce that I started my PhD in quantum computing at Inria Nancy.

title: I will attend the "Journ√©es Informatique Quantique 2025"
summary: While I won't be giving a presentation this time, I'd love to connect and discuss exciting topics in quantum computing! Visit the event website

title: Scientific Game Jam: Les Chevaliers du Quantique
summary: Co-created a digital and pen & paper game for a scientific game jam focused on quantum circuits. Our team won the Jury Prize for innovation and educational value. View the project and download the PDF version.

title: Presentation at PhD Day - Department of Formal Methods, Loria
summary: Presented ongoing work "Escape the Matrix: Graphical Reasoning and Minimal Axioms for Quantum Circuits" at the 2025 PhD Day of the Formal Methods department. Slides available here.
